markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2489) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416), or [scent (imprecise)](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) 30 feet. You must have low-light vision before you can gain darkvision with this feat. If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain that sense with this feat.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different sense each time.
name: Animal Senses
